set(KEYWORD "MentalMapLib")

add_library(${KEYWORD} MentalMap.hpp
                       MentalMap.cpp
                       MentalMapEventListener.hpp
                       Player.hpp
                       Player.cpp
                       Target.hpp
                       Target.cpp
                       Weapon.hpp
                       Weapon.cpp)

target_include_directories(${KEYWORD} PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

target_link_libraries(${KEYWORD} PUBLIC NetworkLib
                                        MusicLib
                                        UtilsLib)
